name: Chicken Breast
description: Chicken breast is a lean source of protein, essential for muscle growth and repair. It’s low in fat and carbohydrates, making it ideal for those looking to maintain or build muscle while keeping calorie intake in check.

name: Brown Rice
description: Brown rice is a whole grain rich in fiber, which aids digestion and provides long-lasting energy. It’s a healthier alternative to white rice, as it retains more nutrients like magnesium and B vitamins.

name: Quinoa
description: Quinoa is a complete protein, containing all nine essential amino acids. It’s also high in fiber, magnesium, and antioxidants, making it a nutritious choice for supporting overall health.

name: Almonds
description: Almonds are rich in healthy fats, protein, and fiber, making them a great snack for satiety and heart health. They also provide a good source of vitamin E, which supports skin health.

name: Salmon
description: Salmon is packed with omega-3 fatty acids, which are essential for brain health and reducing inflammation. It’s also a high-quality protein source, supporting muscle and tissue repair.

name: Eggs
description: Eggs are a versatile and nutrient-dense food, providing high-quality protein and essential vitamins like B12, D, and choline. They are excellent for muscle repair and overall health.

name: Lentils
description: Lentils are a great plant-based protein source and are rich in fiber, helping to regulate blood sugar levels and support digestion. They are also high in iron, which is crucial for oxygen transport in the blood.

name: Greek Yogurt
description: Greek yogurt is rich in protein and probiotics, which are beneficial for gut health. It’s also a good source of calcium, supporting bone health and muscle function.

name: Chickpeas
description: Chickpeas are an excellent source of plant-based protein and fiber, which can help with digestion and maintaining a healthy weight. They also provide essential minerals like iron and magnesium.

name: Spinach
description: Spinach is a nutrient powerhouse, rich in iron, calcium, and vitamins A and C. It supports bone health, immune function, and eye health while being low in calories.

name: Sweet Potatoes
description: Sweet potatoes are rich in complex carbohydrates, fiber, and beta-carotene, which is converted into vitamin A in the body. They support eye health, immune function, and provide long-lasting energy.

name: Tofu
description: Tofu is a versatile plant-based protein that’s rich in iron and calcium. It’s a great option for vegetarians and vegans, supporting muscle health and bone strength.

name: Cottage Cheese
description: Cottage cheese is high in protein and low in fat, making it an excellent choice for those looking to build muscle or lose weight. It’s also a good source of calcium, important for bone health.

name: Peanut Butter
description: Peanut butter is rich in healthy fats and protein, making it a satisfying and nutritious snack. It also provides vitamins and minerals like vitamin E and magnesium, supporting heart health.

name: Broccoli
description: Broccoli is packed with vitamins C and K, fiber, and antioxidants. It supports immune function, bone health, and helps protect against chronic diseases due to its high nutrient content.

name: Zucchini
description: Zucchini is low in calories but high in vitamins A and C, fiber, and antioxidants. It’s a great choice for maintaining a healthy weight and supporting digestive health.

name: Cauliflower
description: Cauliflower is a versatile vegetable rich in fiber and vitamins C and K. It’s low in calories and can be used as a low-carb alternative in many dishes, supporting weight management and overall health.

name: Avocado
description: Avocado is rich in healthy monounsaturated fats, fiber, and vitamins C, E, and K. It supports heart health, skin health, and provides lasting satiety.

name: Blueberries
description: Blueberries are high in antioxidants, particularly vitamin C and anthocyanins, which support brain health and protect against oxidative stress. They’re also low in calories, making them a great addition to any diet.

name: Oats
description: Oats are a whole grain rich in fiber, particularly beta-glucan, which helps lower cholesterol levels. They provide long-lasting energy and support digestive health.
